required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiology of Injuries in Elite Badminton Players: a Prospective Study
clinical_study.official_title: Epidemiology of Injuries in Elite Badminton Players: a Prospective Study

brief_summary.textblock:
Objective: To determine the incidence and characteristics of injuries in elite badminton players over a competitive season.
Design: 12-months prospective cohort study Setting: The French National Institute of Sport, Expertise, and Performance (INSEP).
Participants: Twenty international elite badminton players Independent variables: The type, the location, the occurrence of the injury (match or training), the footwork type, the type of shot and the perceived fatigue were collected.
Main Outcome Measures: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop).

secondary_outcome.measure: Injury incidence rates according to gender
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) in male and female

secondary_outcome.measure: Injury incidence rates according to discipline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) in singles and doubles players

secondary_outcome.measure: Injury incidence rates according to occurence
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Injury incidence rates were calculated per 1000 hours of play (Hop) in match or training

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of injuries according to location (on the body, n)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Description of the number of injuries according to location of the injury on the body (n) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Number of injuries according to location of the injury (on the body, n)

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of injuries according to type of the injury (n)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Description of injuries according to the type of the injury (structure: muscle, tendon, bone, nerve...) (n) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Number of injuries according to type of the injury (n)

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of injuries according to location (on the body, % of all)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Description of the distribution of injuries according to location of the injury on the body (%) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Distribution of injuries according to location of the injury (on the body, % of all)

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of injuries according to type of the injury (% of all)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Description of the distribution of injuries according to the type of the injury (structure: muscle, tendon, bone, nerve...) (%) over the 12-month prospective follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Distribution of injuries according to type of the injury (% of all)

study_pop.textblock: All the international elite badminton players training at the at the French National Institute of Sport, Expertise, and Performance (INSEP)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Badminton players training at the at the French National Institute of Sport, Expertise, and Performance (INSEP)
- Participant competing at an international level
- Medical follow-up over the 12-months duration of the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant unable to speak and read French language
- Participant under the age of 18
- Lack of informed and signed consent

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principal Investigator, Chief Resident in the Sport Medicine Department (MD), PhD student

clinical_study.keyword: Epidemiology, Incidence, Athletic Injuries, Racquet Sports, Badminton
